    • Method Detail

      • setMinZoom

        public void setMinZoom(int zoom)
        Sets the minimum zoom level for the scale bar to be drawn.
        Parameters:
        minimum - zoom level

      • setScaleBarOffset

        public void setScaleBarOffset(float x,
                     float y)
        Sets the scale bar screen offset for the bar. Note: if the bar is set to be drawn centered, this will be the middle of the bar, otherwise the top left corner.
        Parameters:
        x - x screen offset
        y - z screen offset

      • setLineWidth

        public void setLineWidth(float width)
        Sets the bar's line width. (the default is 2)
        Parameters:
        width - the new line width

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(float size)
        Sets the text size. (the default is 12)
        Parameters:
        size - the new text size

      • setImperial

        public void setImperial()
        Sets the length to be shown in imperial units (mi/ft)

      • setNautical

        public void setNautical()
        Sets the length to be shown in nautical units (nm/ft)

      • setMetric

        public void setMetric()
        Sets the length to be shown in metric units (km/m)

      • drawLatitudeScale

        public void drawLatitudeScale(boolean latitude)
        Latitudinal / horizontal scale bar flag
        Parameters:
        latitude -

      • drawLongitudeScale

        public void drawLongitudeScale(boolean longitude)
        Longitudinal / vertical scale bar flag
        Parameters:
        longitude -

      • setCentred

        public void setCentred(boolean centred)
        Flag to draw the bar centered around the set offset coordinates or to the right/bottom of the coordinates (default)
        Parameters:
        centred - set true to centre the bar around the given screen coordinates

      • getBarPaint

        public Paint getBarPaint()
        Return's the paint used to draw the bar
        Returns:
        the paint used to draw the bar

      • setBarPaint

        public void setBarPaint(Paint pBarPaint)
        Sets the paint for drawing the bar
        Parameters:
        pBarPaint - bar drawing paint

      • getTextPaint

        public Paint getTextPaint()
        Returns the paint used to draw the text
        Returns:
        the paint used to draw the text

      • setTextPaint

        public void setTextPaint(Paint pTextPaint)
        Sets the paint for drawing the text
        Parameters:
        pTextPaint - text drawing paint

      • setBackgroundPaint

        public void setBackgroundPaint(Paint pBgPaint)
        Sets the background paint. Set to null to disable drawing of background (default)
        Parameters:
        pBgPaint - the paint for colouring the bar background

      • setEnableAdjustLength

        public void setEnableAdjustLength(boolean adjustLength)
        If enabled, the bar will automatically adjust the length to reflect a round number (starting with 1, 2 or 5). If disabled, the bar will always be drawn in full length representing a fractional distance.

      • setMaxLength

        public void setMaxLength(float pMaxLengthInCm)
        Sets the maximum bar length. If adjustLength is disabled this will match exactly the length of the bar. If adjustLength is enabled, the bar will be shortened to reflect a round number in length.
        Parameters:
        pMaxLengthInCm - maximum length of the bar in the screen in cm. Default is 2.54 (=1 inch)

      • drawSafe

        public void drawSafe(ISafeCanvas c,
            MapView mapView,
            boolean shadow)

        public void disableScaleBar()

      • enableScaleBar

        public void enableScaleBar()
